text: Koroositeh yan marih ceelalloo kee iimaan kee tirtoh ken Seeca numih ceelallo lacay Qiytoo kee Seecok-sa wohuk tu-Aaxige waat Qiy iyya numih ceelallo, tama koros usun Ayti-maleelay cakkik sinni Aytiita Alifte, duuduttey cakÄ·it yabtaamak Arraba sinnik tibbixe, inti-maleelay Baxxaqqa itta Astooti Able waytah inna, usun wohul kas-kassoowa mara hinnon
